text: Richard Rudolph (born 1946) is an American songwriter, musician, music publisher and producer. Richard Rudolph may also refer to: *Richard Rudolph (concentration camp survivor) (1911–2014), last surviving victim of "double persecution" *Richard C. Rudolph (1909–2003), American professor of Chinese literature and archaeology *Dick Rudolph, (1887–1949), American baseball player
title: Richard Rudolph (disambiguation)
